title: [Self-directed] Problem-Based Animation Learning Design for Elementary Education Software Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and understanding of elementary education curricula
context.additional_context: A course for prospective/elementary teachers to cultivate software development competencies for elementary mathematics education. Emphasizes problem-solving skills and creative computational thinking in digital device-provided environments

learning_goals: Elementary math education software can be designed using a problem-based animation learning model
Strategies for enhancing logical thinking and cognitive abilities through animation-based task development can be explained
Formative assessment tools for large-scale learners in LMS environments can be developed and implemented
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
